introduction: 这个系列节目主持人将带我们了解各个伟大画家的世界名画，深度了解名画背后的故事，以及伟大画家的作画历程。让我们一同走进卢浮宫体验不同凡响的文化艺术之旅。Broadcaster and journalist Andrew Marr examines the stories behind some of the most famous works of art ever devised. Why were these pieces created and what makes them, in particular, so eternally fascinating? How much did the lives of the artists, and the society and environment they worked in, influence the paintings? Get ready to see truly iconic images in a whole new light.Watch The World’s Greatest Paintings on BBC Select today. Restrictions apply*.
